plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. I need water and sunshine. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I start as a tiny seed.
💧 I need rain to grow tall.
🌞 I love to be in the sun.

plant.question: I have petals and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I come in many different colors.
👃 You can smell my lovely scent.
🐝 Bees collect nectar from me.

plant.question: I am long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am crunchy and orange (sometimes purple!)
🐰 Bunnies like me raw.
🥗 I'm good in a salad.

plant.question: I am big and tall and have a strong trunk. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I have many branches.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I grow on a vine and am sweet and round. You can eat me green, red or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🍷 Some people make juice from me.
☀️ I like warm weather.

plant.question: I have sharp thorns and beautiful flowers. People like to give me as a gift. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 My flowers smell very nice.
🥀 Be careful of my pointy parts.
💝 People give me to show love.

plant.question: I am a big fruit that grows on a vine. I am usually red or pink inside and have black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I'm perfect for a summer picnic.
🌱 The black seeds can grow into more like me!
💧 I am juicy!

plant.question: I am a tall, strong plant that grows in water or on land. I have hollow, woody stems. What am I?

hints.text: 🎍 Pandas like to eat me.
🏡 Some people make houses from me.
🎋 I grow very fast.

plant.question: I am a root vegetable with a brown or reddish skin and orange flesh. I am sweet and can be baked or mashed. What am I?

hints.text: 🍠 I'm not a regular potato.
🥧 I'm used to make a special pie.
☀️ I have a lot of Vitamin A.

plant.question: I am a green seed that grows inside a pod. People eat me as a vegetable. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am often served as a side dish with dinner.
🌱 You can plant me and more of me will grow.
🥣 Sometimes I'm mushed to make split pea soup.

animal.question: I meow and love to play with yarn. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🐈 I have soft fur and whiskers.
🎾 I chase after string.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail when I'm happy. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🏡 I guard your house.
🐕 I am a friend to people.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🩱 I waddle when I walk.
🦆 I have feathers and a bill.
🌿 I eat plants and small bugs.

animal.question: I say 'Moo' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat grass in the field.
⚫️ I have black and white spots.
🐄 I live on a farm.

animal.question: I hop around and have long ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat carrots.
🐇 I have a fluffy tail.
🌱 I can be found in gardens and fields.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane around my head.
🐾 I am a big cat.
👑 Other animals fear my sound.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have spots all over my body.
🌿 I am the tallest animal.
🌍 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes all over my body. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes are unique to each one of us.
🌱 I eat grass and plants.
🌍 I live in Africa with the lions.

animal.question: I waddle and slide on my belly in the snow and ice. What am I?

hints.text: 🐧 I love to eat fish from the ocean.
⚫️ I am black and white and cannot fly.
🧊 I live in cold, icy places like Antarctica.

animal.question: I have a trunk and big ears. I use my trunk to pick things up. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I can be gray or brown.
🥜 I love peanuts!
🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.
